Packages and loading in data
```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)
library(igraph)
library(ggraph)
library(widyr)

urlfile <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jvit1/sentimentanalysis/main/Scraped_Tweets.csv'
data <- read.csv(url(urlfile))
```

Tokenizing
```{r}
bigrams <- data %>%
  unnest_tokens(bigram, Text, token = "ngrams", n = 2) %>%
  mutate(bigram = str_extract(bigram, "[0-9a-z'\\s]+")) %>%
  drop_na()

bigrams <- bigrams %>%
  separate(bigram, c("word1", "word2"), sep = " ") %>%
  filter(!word1 %in% stop_words$word) %>%
  filter(!word2 %in% stop_words$word) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  unite(bigram, word1, word2, sep = " ") 

bigram.count <- bigrams %>%
  group_by(bigram) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))

bigram.count %>%
  top_n(15, count) %>%
  mutate(bigram = reorder(bigram, count)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = bigram, y = count)) + 
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip()
```
